entry.string:
set -x file="$(pwd)/ABC.exe" pwd;
echo -e "
**************** This is a Deployed JOB Testing for $file******************* " if [[ -f "$file" ]]; then count=1 num1=$((1 + RANDOM % 100)) num2=$((1 + RANDOM % 1000)) num3=$((1 + RANDOM % 2000))
echo -e " -------------------------- TEST_CASE ($count) --------------------------" $file -v -i <<<"$num1 $num2 num3" |exit 0 echo -e "**************** SUCCESS ********************* "
else echo -e "**************** ERROR ********************* " echo "Test Build Failure - ABC.exe notfound $file " echo -e "******************************************** " exit 1 fi
